# Runtime API

## API Reference

Runtime API for module loading and HMR.

### Module Loading

Modules are loaded at runtime.

**Example:**
```javascript
// Runtime code generated by Rspack
__webpack_require__(/*! ./module */ "./src/module.js");
```

### HMR API

Hot Module Replacement API.

**Example:**
```javascript
if (module.hot) {
  module.hot.accept('./module.js', () => {
    // Handle module update
  });
}
```

### Module Object

Module object in runtime.

**Properties:**
- `module.hot` - HMR interface
- `module.id` - Module ID
- `module.loaded` - Whether module is loaded

### Example: HMR Usage

```javascript
if (module.hot) {
  module.hot.accept('./App.jsx', () => {
    // Re-render app
    renderApp();
  });
}
```

### Chunk Loading

Chunk loading at runtime.

**Example:**
```javascript
// Dynamic import
import('./module.js').then(module => {
  // Use module
});
```

**See also:** `examples/config/dev-server.md`
